location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Diagram of Wireless Communications (May 1940) (To accompany M. R. on A. I. O. C. [Military Report on Anglo-Iranian Oil Company])'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 252 x 205mm, on sheet 293 x 234mm

mods.abstract: A map of the northern end of the Persian Gulf and its hinterland. The map shows wireless stations in the region, indicating the distance of each from Abadan Aerodrome. The map was produced by the General Staff India and includes a printing statement which reads 'Survey Section No. 1065 July 1940'. The map is marked secret (copy no. 0007) and is Map No. 5 from the volume 'Military Report on the Anglo-Iranian Oil Company's (South Iranian) Oilfield Area'.
